articles.title: Richest African's wealth jumps R20 billion in less than a month - News24
articles.description: Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest man, saw his fortune grow by $1.3 billion (R19.6 billion) in less than a month on the back of surge in the share price of his cement company.
